title: Champions League returns: Mbappe's date with destiny
shortDescription: The Champions League returns on Tuesday and all eyes will be on Kylian Mbappe as Paris Saint-Germain host Real Madrid at the Parc des Princes.

title: Derby optimistic of bidder before deadline and confident of fulfilling fixtures
shortDescription: There is increasing optimism at Derby that a preferred bidder will be appointed by the club's administrators by the end of February.

title: Robertson: Away fans will return for Old Firm matches
shortDescription: Rangers managing director Stewart Robertson has confirmed there will be away allocations at the remaining two Old Firm matches this season.

title: Ancelotti all but confirms Bale will leave Real at end of season
shortDescription: Carlo Ancelotti has all-but confirmed Gareth Bale will leave Real Madrid when his contract expires this summer.

title: Prutton's Championship predictions
shortDescription: Who is David Prutton tipping for victory in the Sky Bet Championship in the midweek round of fixtures? Find out here...

title: Kelly on comeback from ACL injury: I have my eyes on the Euros
shortDescription: Man City forward Chloe Kelly on her comeback from an ACL injury and how she hasn't ruled out claiming her England place back.

title: Papers: PSG to prepare package for Pogba
shortDescription: All the top stories and transfer rumours from Tuesday's national newspapers...

title: Rangnick: No need to strip Maguire of captaincy despite 'weaker moments'
shortDescription: Ralf Rangnick insists there is no need to strip Harry Maguire of the Man Utd captaincy despite admitting he has seen "some weaker moments" from the defender recently.

title: Pote: From Wolves reserves to Champions League
shortDescription: How Pedro Goncalves, known as Pote, went from playing in the Checkatrade Trophy for Wolves to lighting up the Champions League.

title: Bruce's first WBA home game ends in stalemate
shortDescription:
Steve Bruce's first home game in charge of West Brom ended in a 0-0 draw
against promotion-chasing rivals Blackburn at The Hawthorns.

title: Scottish Cup QFs: Rangers travel to Dundee | Dundee Utd vs Celtic
shortDescription: Old Firm rivals Celtic and Rangers will both head for Dundee in the quarter-finals of the Scottish Cup, while Hearts face St Mirren and Motherwell take on Hibs.

title: Cavallo's coming out and Hamilton's allyship on British LGBT Awards shortlists
shortDescription: Josh Cavallo is among 10 Sports Personality nominees at the 2022 British LGBT Awards, while Lewis Hamilton's Progress Pride helmet is also recognised.

title: Rangers chief talks administration, title race, Gerrard impact & more
shortDescription: Ten years on from being placed into administration, Rangers managing director Stewart Robertson looks back on the Scottish Premiership champions' journey to the top.

title: Eriksen makes return in Brentford friendly
shortDescription: Christian Eriksen played an hour in Brentford's behind-closed-doors friendly against Southend on Monday as he steps up plans to make his Bees debut.

title: Cancelo opens up about 'horrific' home assault
shortDescription: Joao Cancelo has opened up about the "horrific" home invasion in which he was assaulted at the end of December and says it has deeply affected his family.

title: Pep unfazed by CL pressure on City | 'Squad harmony is exceptional'
shortDescription: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola has reiterated he is unfazed by the idea that there is excess pressure on his side to win the Champions League this season.
